title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for g'(x)

1 point is earned for g(1) and g'(1)

1 point is earned for tangent line equation

g ( 1 ) = e  f ( 1 ) = e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41DD@

g ' ( x ) = e f ( x ) f ' ( x ) ,  g'(1)=e f(1) f ' ( 1 ) = − 4 e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5528@

The tangent line is given by y = e 2 − 4 e 2 ( x − 1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@415B@ .
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for g'(x)

1 point is earned for g(1) and g'(1)

1 point is earned for tangent line equation

g( 1 )= e  f( 1 ) = e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41DD@

g'(x)= e f(x) f'(x),  g'(1)=e f(1) f'(1)=−4 e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5528@

The tangent line is given by y= e 2 −4 e 2 (x−1) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@415B@ .

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for g'(x)

1 point is earned for g(1) and g'(1)

1 point is earned for tangent line equation

g( 1 )= e  f( 1 ) = e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41DD@

g'(x)= e f(x) f'(x),  g'(1)=e f(1) f'(1)=−4 e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5528@

The tangent line is given by y= e 2 −4 e 2 (x−1) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@415B@ .

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for g'(x)

1 point is earned for g(1) and g'(1)

1 point is earned for tangent line equation

g( 1 )= e  f( 1 ) = e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41DD@

g'(x)= e f(x) f'(x),  g'(1)=e f(1) f'(1)=−4 e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5528@

The tangent line is given by y= e 2 −4 e 2 (x−1) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@415B@ .

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for g'(x)

1 point is earned for g(1) and g'(1)

1 point is earned for tangent line equation

g( 1 )= e  f( 1 ) = e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41DD@

g'(x)= e f(x) f'(x),  g'(1)=e f(1) f'(1)=−4 e 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5528@

The tangent line is given by y= e 2 −4 e 2 (x−1) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@415B@ .
